A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is why I never trust critic reviews when I’m looking at movie reviews. Did I watch the same movie as them? The movie just dragged on as a space police chase. Luke trained with Yoda and it still took him years to become a powerful Jedi. Rey follows Luke around and whacks him with a metal rod and all of sudden is a strong force user. The whole casino story plot was dumb and uninteresting. They made a big deal about Rey’s parents and then made them junk dealers. Luke basically turns into a whiny bum and Kylo Ren is still emo asf. Princess Leia flying through space was cringey. The jokes were over the top\, cheesy\, and out of place in Star Wars. I felt like I watched Harry Potter meets marvel\, mixed with a little bit of Star Wars. Rian Johnson shouldn’t get 3 more Star Wars movies.
